name: Galactic Warfare (rylan21)
description:
Epic spaceship battle game with the option of local multiplayer and/or single-player battle modes.

Controls:

Keyboard

Join: Space

Throttle: W/S or Up/Down keys 

Rotation: mouse pointer

Shoot: Left click

Missiles: Rightclick

Implosion bomb: Q

Bomb: E

Upgrade fire rate: R (30 crystals)

Gamepad Controller

Join: Start button

Throttle: left joystick up and down

Rotation: Right stick

Shoot: Right Trigger

Missiles: Left trigger

Implosion bomb: Left bumper

Bomb: Right bumper

Upgrade fire rate: Button North (30 crystals)
